mapper.update: update j_prepare_content set flag = true where preid = #{prepareId}
update j_lession_prepare set ordernum =id where ordernum = 0
update j_prepare_content set orderidx =id where orderidx = 0
update j_prepare_content set flag = true where preId = #{0} and contType = #{1} and contId = #{2}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, '' as timeLabel FROM j_lession_prepare WHERE tfcode LIKE #{0} AND userid = #{1} AND flag = false ORDER BY updatetime desc,createtime desc
SELECT id, title, '' as timeLabel FROM j_lession_prepare WHERE tfcode = #{0} AND userid = #{1} AND flag = false ORDER BY updatetime desc,createtime desc

SELECT p.id, p.title, #{timeLabel} as timeLabel,p.tfcode FROM j_lession_prepare p LEFT JOIN j_syscourse s on s.tfcode = p.tfcode
WHERE 1 = 1 AND p.userid = #{userId} AND p.flag = false and s.TermId = #{termId} and s.SubjectId = #{subjectId}
AND title like #{title}
AND p.updatetime >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK)
AND p.updatetime >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK)- p.updatetime > 0
AND DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)- p.updatetime > 0
ORDER BY p.updatetime desc,p.createtime desc

select n.structCode as tfcode,t.Name as title,r.id as resId from z_resnav n left join j_syscourse t on t.TFcode = n.StructCode LEFT JOIN z_resource r on r.ResCode = n.ResCode where n.rescode = #{resCode} ORDER BY n.createdt limit 1

select id,title,resId,fromFlag,unifytype,size,timeline,time,imgpath,filesuffix from ( select t.id ,a.id as resId,a.name as title,a.createTime as time,1 as fromFlag ,p.MType as unifyType,a.AssetSize as size,'' as timeline,a.AssetPath as imgPath ,'' as fileSuffix,t.orderIdx from j_prepare_content t LEFT JOIN z_asset a on a.id = t.contId LEFT JOIN x_resourcetype p on p.id = a.unifyTypeId where t.preid = #{0} and t.flag = false and t.contType in (1,9) and a.flag =false and a.FileType = 'A'
UNION ALL
select t.id,z.Id as resId,z.title,z.CreateDT as time,0 as fromFlag ,p.MType as unifyType,z.FSize as size,IFNULL(m.res_time,'') as timeline ,CONCAT(z.FPath,'/',z.Fname) as imgPath ,'' as fileSuffix,t.orderIdx from j_prepare_content t LEFT JOIN z_resource z on t.contId = z.Id LEFT JOIN x_resourcetype p on p.id = z.MType LEFT JOIN z_res_medium m on m.res_code = z.ResCode where t.preid = #{0} and t.flag = false and t.contType in (2,10) and z.flag = false
UNION ALL
select t.id,r.id as resId,r.title,r.CreateDT as time ,fromFlag as fromFlag ,p.MType as unifyType,r.FSize as size,'' as timeline,r.fullpath as imgPath ,'' as fileSuffix,t.orderIdx from j_prepare_content t LEFT JOIN z_districts_resource r on r.id = t.contId LEFT JOIN x_resourcetype p on p.id = r.mtype where t.preid = #{0} and t.flag = false and t.contType in (11,12) and r.flag = false
)temp_result ORDER BY orderIdx desc

select id as resid,name as title,resourceid as rescode, 1 as fromflag,islocal as isnet,iswjb as isdwj ,assetpath as path,0 as isebook,'' as fileext,unifyTypeId as mtypeid from z_asset where id = #{0} and filetype = 'A' and flag = false

select id as resid,title,rescode,0 as fromflag , 0 isnet ,isdwj,concat(fpath,'/',fname) as path ,IF(fromflag=2 and mtype=40 and LOCATE('.html',fname)>0,1,0) as isebook,fileext,mtype as mtypeid from z_resource where flag = false and id = #{0}

select s.tfcode,CONCAT(s2.name,'-', IF(p.bookname is null ,s.Name,p.bookname) ) as title from (SELECT DISTINCT LEFT(t.tfcode,10) as tfcode
FROM j_lession_prepare t WHERE LENGTH(t.tfcode)>=10 and t.flag =false AND t.userid = #{userId} )temp LEFT JOIN j_syscourse s on temp.tfcode = s.tfcode LEFT JOIN j_producttfcodecontrast p on p.tfcode = s.tfcode LEFT JOIN j_syscourse s2 on s2.id = s.PnodeId where s.flag = false and p.procode = 'zy' ORDER BY s.orderNum,p.orderNo

SELECT preparenums,resourcenums,nodefinishednums,(nodeallnumbers-nodefinishednums) as nodeomitnums from ( select sum(1) as nodeallnumbers,sum(prenum) as preparenums ,sum(if(prenum=0,0,1)) as nodefinishednums,sum(resnum) as resourcenums from ( SELECT id,tfcode ,(select count(1) from j_lession_prepare t where t.tfcode = p.tfcode and userid =#{userId} and flag =FALSE ) as prenum ,(select count(c.id) from j_lession_prepare t,j_prepare_content c where t.tfcode = p.tfcode and t.flag =false and userid = #{userId} and t.id = c.preId and c.flag = false and c.contType in (1,2,9,10,11,12) ) as resnum FROM j_syscourse p WHERE tfcode LIKE #{tfcode} AND flag = FALSE )temp )tep2

SELECT id, title, '' as timeLabel ,(select COUNT(1) from j_prepare_content c where c.flag = false and c.preId =p.id and c.contType in (1,2,9,10,11,12) ) as contentnumber FROM j_lession_prepare p WHERE flag = false AND userid = #{userId} ORDER BY updatetime desc limit 3
select count(1) as num from j_lession_prepare where userid =#{userId} and flag = false and title =#{title} and tfcode =#{tfcode}
select count(1) as num from j_lession_prepare where userid =#{userId} and flag = false and title like #{title}

select (select edi.id from j_syscourse edi where edi.termid = s.TermId and edi.subjectid = s.SubjectId and edi.flag = false and edi.pnodeid = 0 and LOCATE(edi.tfcode,s.tfcode) > 0 )editionid ,(select book.id from j_syscourse book where book.pnodeid = editionId and s.flag = false and LOCATE(book.tfcode,s.tfcode) > 0 )bookid from j_syscourse s WHERE s.tfcode =#{tfcode};
